entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Chetwynd
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:10 AM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chetwynd Airport 2:24 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -8.0°C

Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -10.5°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A
